content:
Do you want to learn more about CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative, the people who stand behind it and their work?
Watch the first two interviews in CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative: Meet the Team Leaders video series:
Emanuela Girardi: YouTube - YouTube
Davide Bacciu: YouTube - YouTube

You can also look forward to the interviews with Davide Bacciu, Ann Nowé, Jose Sousa and other Topic Leaders from this Initiative. Stay tuned! :soon: :mobile_phone:

:movie_camera: Third video in CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative: Meet the Team Leaders video series is live now!
Enjoy the interview with Ann Nowé and her take on how AI can help desicision makers while tackling the current crisis: YouTube - YouTube

:soon: :mobile_phone: More videos are coming - Jose Sousa, Marco Maratea and others will soon share their experience working in CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative.

:movie_camera: The latest part of CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative: Meet the Team Leaders video series is live now!
Watch José Sousa present the contributions of Mobility and monitoring data analysis to dealing with the pandemics:
YouTube - The CLAIRE COVID-19 Initiative: Meet the Team Leaders | Video Series | Part 4 of 8

:soon: :mobile_phone: More videos are coming - Marco Maratea, Manilo de Domenico and others will soon share their experience working in CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative.

Resource management, planning, scheduling - these are some of the things AI can help with while dealing with pandemics Electric light bulb How? Watch Marco Maratea from CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative share his insight about this topic :point_right: YouTube - The CLAIRE COVID-19 Initiative: Meet the Team Leaders | Video Series | Part 5 of 8

Have you heard the term #infodemic? Hint: it has something to do with information and epidemic. Learn more from Manlio De Domenico, #CLAIRE #Covid19 Initiative, on how #AI can help to better understand this phenomenon and more in the most recent part of CLAIRE Covid19 Initiative: Meet the Team Leaders video series
YouTube - The CLAIRE COVID-19 Initiative: Meet the Team Leaders | Video Series | Part 6 of 8

#aiforgood #aiforall #humancentredai
